front.title: Preprint Proposals for the 2007 Edition of the National Electrical Safety Code®
front.abstract: This Preprint provides the full text of each proposal to revise the 2002 edition of the NESC together with the recommendation of the subcommittee that has cognizance of the rule addressed by the change proposal (CP). A change bar, located in the left hand margin, signifies the specific material that the various subcommittees each have approved for inclusion in the revised Code.
